===Act 8===
{{Description|A ruin machine that can absorb energy and hurl it back as an attack. This machine has even greater abilities than the Ruin Drake, being able to attack from the air and on the ground. The Aeonblight Drake can periodically release a dangerous torrent of energy and increase its own Elemental RES against the previous main type of Elemental DMG it has suffered. Under various circumstances, the {{Color|bp|cores}} all over its body will be exposed. Take such opportunities to attack those cores, and you may be able to immobilize this creature and {{Color|bp|remove its Elemental RES boost}}. Whenever this creature recovers from paralysis, it will switch between aerial and ground-attack forms.|Aeonblight Drake}}
;Battle{{Colon}} Climactic Showdown
